project.title: Personal Portfolio Website
project.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and resume. It includes sections such as home, about, skills, and contact. Users can explore the home, about, skills, and contact sections for a comprehensive overview.

project.title: Book Store Website
project.description: A simple book store website created using only HTML and CSS. It features a clean and responsive design, displaying a collection of books. The website features a user-friendly interface, allowing visitors to explore book categories, view details, and easily navigate through the collection.

project.title: Calculator Website
project.description: An interactive calculator website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It supports basic arithmetic operations and provides a user-friendly interface. The calculator allows users to perform calculations with ease.
